ace.skill: Increases the support passive skill effect by 10% and MAX HP by 12%

active.name: Starlight Amplification III
active.text: Increases the attack power by 12.5 / 15.625 / 18.75 / 21.875 / 25% and critical rate by 12.5 / 15.625 / 18.75 / 21.875 / 25% . (Accumulates up to 3 times)

passive.name: Traversing Starlight II
passive.text: Increases the critical damage by 4 / 8 / 12 / 16 / 20% and penetration by 4 / 8 / 12 / 16 / 20% of the allies within the vertical line.

passive.name: Luminant Starlight
passive.text: Decreases the enemy team's action speed by 6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30% and critical resistance by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15% for 3 min. when being attacked.

passive.name: Spreading Starlight II
passive.text: Increases the MAX HP by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15% and critical damage resistance by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15%, and decreases the incoming damage by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15% of the allies within the position.
effects: within position critcal damage resistance up
within position decreases incoming damage up

finalTechnique.text: Decreases the incoming damage by 15% for 5 min.

ace.skill: Increases the HP by 22%, reflex by 22% and pass effect by 22% of Whirlwind and Ardor players.

active.name: Pleasure of Supremacy III
active.text: Recovers the action bar of the designated target by 100% and increases the target's receiving pass effect by 40% and critical rate by 25%.

passive.name: Black Bliss
passive.text: Increases the ally team’s MAX HP by 30% and action speed by 15% with a pass for 6 min, in addition to applying 1 count on cumulative active shoot count with a 100% chance.​

passive.name: Seed of Corruption II
passive.text: Steals 20% of the Attack Power and 15% of the critical damage resistance of the enemies currently in the assigned position for 3 min with an action.​

passive.name: Heart of Ambition
passive.text: Increases the reflex by 30% and pass effect by 30%, and decreases the incoming damage by 10%.​

finalTechnique.text: Increases the critical rate by 20% for 5 min.

ace.skill: Increases the action speed by 25(40)% and reflex by 30(48)% of Thunder players.
ace.name: Queen's Grace

active.name: Earthquake Iceberg III
active.text: Decreases the action speed and defense of the enemy team by 25% for 12 min.

passive.name: Controlling Power
passive.text: Increases the Attack Power, MAX HP, reflex, and critical rate by 25% of the allies currently in the assigned position.

passive.name: Inner Passion
passive.text: Increases the critical damage by 30% and the action bar always starts at 30%. (Added to the action bar bonus given at the start of the match)​

passive.name: Unavoidable Destiny II
passive.text: Increases the Attack Power by 70% and reflex by 35% and decreases the incoming damage by 20% for 1 min with an attack or when being attacked. (Accumulates up to 2 times)​.

finalTechnique.text: Increases the reflex by 15% for 5 min.

ace.skill: Increases the damage that Light players deal to Dark players by 25(35)%.​
ace.name: Poker Face

active.name: Grand Finale III
active.text: Increases the attack power by 25% and critical damage by 25%. (Accumulates up to 5 times.) (The effect only applies to active shoots)

passive.name: Excellent Skills II
passive.text: Increases the reflexes and penetration by 40%.​

passive.name: Limitation and Determination
passive.text: Increases the action speed by 20%, Attack Power by 30%, and critical rate by 20% for 45 min with an attack. (Accumulates up to 3 times) (Lasts even under inability effects)

passive.name: Clutch Moment
passive.text: Increases the critical rate by 1.2% and attack power by 10 for every 3 action speed you possess

finalTechnique.text: Adds 1 more active accumulation for 5 min.

ace.skill: Increases the penetration by 22(35)% and MAX HP by 25(42)% of Light and Whirlwind players.
ace.name: Executive No. 1

active.name: Do I Look Like Devil? !!!
active.text: Increases the Attack Power by 100% and reflex by 100% of the allies currently in the assigned position for 5 min.

passive.name: Limit Response
passive.text: Increases reflexes by 70% and decreases the incoming damage by 20% when being attacked.

passive.name: Dragon's Fighting Spirit II
passive.text: Increases critical rate by 25% and critical damage by 25% of the allies within the position.

passive.name: Devil Destructor
passive.text: Presty receives 5% less damage and has 5% increased critical damage resistance when placed in the Goal Keeper position. (The effect becomes stronger for every ally player that is active)

cooperationTechnique.text: Decreases the incoming damage by 15% when being penetrated.

ace.skill: Decreases the damage coming from Dark players by 20%.
ace.name: Hope of Karadrad

active.name: Clockwork of Purification III
active.text: Removes the active debuff effects on you when you get attacked and recovers 30% of the lost HP first for 8 min.

passive.name: Clockwork Activation
passive.text: Increases the effect of Spirit Stones on Presty by 30%, HP by 600, and defense by 20%. (Activates only when placed in Goal Keeper position)​

passive.name: Clockwork of Binding
passive.text: When receiving a shot, paralyzes and decreases the enemy shooter's critical rate by 40% with a 100% chance for 3 min.​

passive.name: Rally of the Guardian Knights II
passive.text: Presty receives 5% less damage and has 5% increased critical damage resistance when placed in the Goal Keeper position. (The effect becomes stronger for every ally player that is active)

finalTechnique.text: Increases the critical damage resistance by 25% for 5 min.
